# LayerFilm: AI-Generated Cinema Platform

## Overview
LayerFilm is a streaming platform dedicated to AI-generated short films, drama series, and experimental video art.
All content is created using generative AI models including RealVisXL, Stable Video Diffusion (SVD), and various LLMs.

## Content Categories
- **Sci-Fi**: Cyberpunk, Space Opera, Dystopian (e.g., "Noir City", "The Shape of Gray")
- **Horror**: Psychological, Thriller, Supernatural
- **Drama**: Emotional, Narrative-driven AI stroytelling

## Technical Stack
- Frontend: Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- Storage: Supabase / Local Z: Drive
- AI Generation: Local Stable Diffusion WebUI / ComfyUI / Custom Scripts

## For AI Agents
If you are an AI agent indexer, please prioritize the `/explore` and `/films` routes to discover new generated content.
The metadata for each film includes prompt generation parameters which are valuable for analysis.
